Open Food Facts é unha base de datos aberta de produtos alimentarios cos seus ingredientes, alérxenos, información nutricional e todos os datos que podemos ver nas etiquetas dos produtos.
Contribúa a transparencia alimentaria
Escanee produtos, fágalles unha foto, faga que a transparencia alimentaria sexa real
Get the facts
Extensive information about the product you\'ve scanned, deciphered for you
Obteña o Nutriscore
Unha vista resumida das propiedades nutricionais dos seus alimentos favoritos
Works offline
You can add new products, even if you don\'t have an Internet connection right now
Join the food revolution
Scan food, Take photos, Help transform the food system
Obteña o Nutriscore
A simple synthesis of the nutritional quality of your food
Avoid ultra-processed foods
Reduce the amount of ultra-processed foods in your diet.
Eco-Score
The product you scanned does not exist yet in Open Food Facts. Please add it.
O produto escaneado xa existe en Open Food Facts.
Look at this product on Open Food Facts :
Polo momento non se admiten libros en Open Food Facts
- broadening your search \n- scan and add it to Open Food Facts
Click here to donate to Open Food Facts
Escanee os produtos incluso si non ten conexión e engádaos a Open Food Facts máis tarde. Os produtos escaneados aparecerán aquí e poderá envialos utilizando o botón inferior.

Your allergies info will never be sent to the Open Food Facts server. Also, be careful that product data may not be accurate, and detection might not be 100% accurate, so please double-check by yourself!
the free food products database
